title: Exam: Banking and Transactions
description: 15 questions evaluating knowledge of banking services, transaction types, and the Past Continuous tense.

items.question: Which term describes taking money out of your account?
items.explanation: A withdrawal is an act of taking money out of an account.

The amount of money currently in the account
